content: I think this is ready and relatively easy at this point.
How long do you think we'll last before someone asks for the non-associative versions too?
Not long I presume. @Christopher Hoskin?
I don't know, but I realized we also need non-unital normed comm ring.

Yaël Dillies said:

Not long I presume. Christopher Hoskin?

Hard to say - most of my recent PRs seem to have run into the mud. Possibly I need to go away and rethink things? Was hoping to get some time to think about it this week, but hasn't happened yet.
On your M-structure PR you've made some good progress. If you just finish up a few things I think it's close to being ready for merging.
